q: Sergey Brin , meanwhile, will now devote his time to strategic projects and new product development. Commenting on these changes in a press release ahead of the company's earnings call today, Eric Schmidt said, We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time. By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long time to come.

Google's investors believed the company needed a more mature leader. Eric Schmidt , 55, will remain an adviser to Larry Page and Google's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , as Google's executive chairman. In my clear opinion, Larry Page is ready to lead and I'm excited about working with both him and Sergey Brin for a long Tim Cooke to come, Eric Schmidt said. Larry Page praised Eric Schmidt , too.
